Blog.post: Now, it's time to put more effort on my dissertation. I really really want to finish it as soon as possible. Just because I've never go anywhere for holidays. I decide to start typing some report but since we have to use Latex format. so, I have to learn how to use these tools (life is full of learning .. ha ha) Cause i'm still windows user. I have to do it in the windows way. 1. install cygwin 2. install xemacs this link is very useful for learning how to install and make it work! urlLink http://home.imf.au.dk/hellmund/xemacs.html Now, i'm trying to use latex.

I'm so happy that my mom called me from on my birthday (in thailand time). But at that time in Edinburgh, It's 22 May. So, I'm still working. I call her back after i'm at home and we have a little chat:) Thanks for the card and the gift :) Also I really enjoy the dinner at the McKelly Steak House with your family. xxx

I just got the transcript from the university. There is really no chance to get distinction :( Applied Databases A Bioinformatics 1 B Bioinformatics 2 B Data Intensive Linguistics B Genetic Algorithms and Genetic Programming B Introduction to Vision and Robotics C Learning from Data 1 B Programming in Java A Single mark for progression: B (65) I'm a bit sad about Robotics but we really can't change the past, right ? I (almost) tried my best already .. ha ha ha ;) study & work & going out - that's my job

I'm Very Happy. With everybody in ur family. After that, I also have another party with Thai friends. I really enjoy myself today and tonight. With U and with friends.. and at night with U again and your good night hug. always thinking of u;) xx

Happy birthday to u ja .. kon dee I know u are very very very busy even on your birthday. But i just want to say 'happy birthday' to you and also give you the first gift The first surprise with the cake was fail because of my Ting-Tong. I don't have the lighter for the candle.. how silly am i? ha ha ha But the second surprise still works :) Happy birthday baby! love u mak ja

I've got the dissertation topic since February. The topic is "Classifying gene expression data using genetic algorithm" Now, it's time to start working on it! Today, i meet my supervisor to see what i have to do? the first thing i have to do is to meet him every Tuesday at 2pm. I really want to say 'Thank you' to him cause if he makes me to see him earlier, I would die!! ha ha ha So, my project start with reading as many papers as I can about GA and microarray. OK... let go for it!!!

At last, i think i can fix the problem with the text files. At least, my supervisor said i should move to the next phase :) Now, it's time for classification by k-nearest neighbor It's not too hard.. but feel lazy again... may be because of the football euro :p ha ha ha oh.. thanks for the lunch man.. i'm so full of food & happiness :) xxx (@^_^@)

I like this song =========================================== Title : Flowers in the windows Album : The invisible band Artist : Travis When I first held you I was cold A melting snowman I was told That there was no one there to hold Before, I swore, that I would be alone forever more * Oh, wow, look at (you/us) now Flowers in the window It's such a lovely day and I'm glad you feel the same Cos to stand up, out in the crowd You are one in a million And I love you so let's watch the flowers grow There is no reason to feel bad But there are many seasons to feel glad, sad, mad It's just a bunch of feelings that we have to hold And I am here to help you with the load (*) So now we're here and now is fine So far away from there and there is time, time, time To plant new seeds and watch them grow So there'll be flowers in the window when we go (*,*) Let's watch the flowers grow ========================================= After I told you about this song, you told me that this song is for the couple who are going to have a baby !!! quite surprise in the word they use in the song. This make me like this song more :) and Love U more xxx

I got a problem with loading text file into program to classify. I just finished figure out what happen to the data !!! There are 6 lines errors of all 61 files..I have to fix manually But it's not so bad. It give me an inspiration to work on with my project. Anyway, I need more consistent content! The biological data needs some standard of database

Thank you baby for calling me this morning. That makes me feel good that i have you who always encourage me. The presentation starts at 2:00pm and finish at 4:20pm I'm the second student who speaked. There are so many questions from the lecturers and friends. It was good that i know how people think about my project or what really i have to do in order to finish my project ? One thing is i feel i don't prepare enough to speak english in front of the public. It's the first time.. it will be better and better in the future with ur support baby :) xxx
the MSc project review meeting will be time: 2:00-3:30pm date: Wednesday 9th June venue: room 4.03 in Appleton Tower go go go !!!

This time is real. Now, i'm preparing for the presentation of the progress which is still slow. But I already come up with the idea that may help me with the project. Hope it work !!! : RankGene software + GA + KNN now, i just download rankgene and try to play with it (",)

Just finish watching the last samurai movie last night. It's quite a good movie although it's really hollywood movie. But at least, there is no real love scene in the movie which is good :) I give this movie about 7/10. Now, i want to see other movies (in DVD) such as - cheaper by dozen - payback - lord of the ring - etc. i think i should wait to watch them only 1 movie a week.. ha ha

Now, I just realize the meaning of the word 'research' It's really mean 're' + 'search' Because one paper refers to many papers. So, i have to re search those papers to understand what i have to do. so so so many papers to read Y_Y' i'll try to summarize and then do the ppt file to present my project on this 7 June,2004.

--------------------------------------------------------- Can the language u speak change your identity ? --------------------------------------------------------- This question is from my friends when we talk together in the little party with some drinks;) If you are Thai and speak Thai .. that's definitely your identity. But if you speak other languages which are not your mother language, is that can change you identity ? What do you think about it? For me, it's quite hard to express yourself in other language. But you are the way you are. So, the way you act is still yourself. It's not that hard to make everybody understand the real you ;)

even though i use java in my project, i still have to make sure that it can run on linux especially the DICE system of informatics. so, i'm back to linux as a beginner again Here is the link to urlLink linux in a nutshell book for use as a reference. It is a short summary of linux basic command -> urlLink http://www.laynetworks.com/linux.htm future plan -> linux based user.. (ha ha ha.. it's still a day dreamming plan)

RuanThai , Thai restaurant in urlLink Edinburgh , Scotland "People of a certain age may remember Mr Ben, a children's cartoon where a gentleman entered a shop that led to exotic other worlds. I got a similar feeling when I went to the RuanThai . RuanThai sits down a cobbled lane in Cockburn Street and on entering the establishment, you are immediately transported somewhere far away, like Shangri-La. This is simply one of the most imaginative and beautiful interiors you'll see in the Capital; a spacious restaurant in an alley split into three intimate rooms bedecked in traditional Thai carving and panelling,with blossoms hanging in lattices from the roof. The enhanted atmosphere is perfected by the scent of flowers and traditional Thai background music. RuanThai literally means 'Thai house', and owner has literally built one with his family. His skills in design are matched by his skills as a restaurateur, which has led to RuanThai becoming a popular destination over the past two years for the young, fashionable set who lounge around Cockburn Street and its environs. The decor may be traditional Thai, however the menu is contemporary, with one clever twist being the Pad Thai Loog Thoong, which translates as 'the cowboy noodle', and is a clever twist on the classic Pad Thai noodle. There is a sister restaurant, the Ruanmai , located in Rose Street, which is like one small, intimate room of the RuanThai, and caters more for business clientele. RuanThai really is something special, perfect for taking someone special to. " quoted from Edinburgh the entertainment guide --------------------------------------------------------------------- Ruan Thai - Thai restaurant on Cockburn Street, Edinburgh by urlLink the list Ruan Mai - Thai restaurant on Rose Street, Edinburgh by urlLink the list

Useful tips & tricks Breaking lines after / Source: David Carlisle Q: [the document text extended into the right margin] .... sport/utility A: if you used sport\slash utility you would allow \TeX to break the line after the / ------------------------------------------------------------ MY IDEA: I adapt it for use in breaking lines after url such as urlLink http://genome-www.stanford.edu/sutech/download/nci60 -> http:\slash\slash genome-www.stanford.edu\slash sutech\slash download\slash nci60 ------------------------------------------------------------ actually i want to use url package but i have to try on dice machine first

You have a great product, many customers, and are delivering your product to hordes of happy customers online. Serving large files creates problems of scaling, flash crowds, and reliability. As you grow, they become more central to your business, but your bandwidth costs go up as well. It's a vicious cycle. There is a solution. BitTorrent is a simple software product which addresses all of these problems. The key to cheap file distribution is to tap the unutilized upload capacity of your customers. It's free. Their contribution grows at the same rate as their demand, creating limitless scalability for a fixed cost.

Now, i change the report from m$ word to latex according to Informatics Project thesis rule. once, u get familiar with it... it's cool man!! but i'm not familiar with it yet.. the good thing is informatics department provides me a template of dessertation. but i still want to learn more about latex documents for a beginner -> urlLink http://www.ctan.org/starter/?action=/index.html

It provided a good price on Wednesday .. steak for 4.xx pound .. quite cheap and nice ('',) If u have order pasta -> it's buy one get one FREE!! Happy 7-month anniversary xxx

It's not easy to build e-commerce.. thinking about web hosting and catelogue online is easy.. building web is also easy.. but selling on web is NOT! now, i'm helping my friend build shopping web site just buy a shopping software urlLink http://www.x-cart.com we try to figuire out which web hosting give reasonable price. so many web site to look at.. :( tired jing jing xxx

The new text editor of blogspot is so cool! now, we even can upload picture to blog !! Thanks to blogspot.com I have to think about what to write in background sections. there are so many thing to write.. can't design which one ??? Two main parts are gene selector multiclass classification Now, i got 6 pages left to write !! สู้ๆ oh!.. i miss u today (^^,) xxx
อยากได้อ่า ความชอบส่วนตัว ห้ามเลียนแบบ..... เพราะ...... มันจาทำให้เปลืองตังค์ -_-"
ทำไมขี้เกียจอย่างนี้ !!! ส่ง background section 10 หน้า วันอังคาร ที่ 20 ก.ค. นี้ ยังเขียนได้ 3 หน้าอยู่เล้ยยยย จาจบไหมเนี้ย ??

This is the key date of dissertation deadline : --------------------------------------------------- 23 July Hand-in Background section for feedback 4th week July Begin writing technical sections 13 August First draft 23 August Second draft 2 September Submit Thesis BEFORE 12 NOON --------------------------------------------------- That shocks me !!!

I take a look at urlLink http://bact.blogspot.com and found something interesting for me ;) urlLink A Talk by Bruce Eckel: Java Issues & Directions A talk given at UC Berkeley, Haas School of Business, on June 25, 2004. on first 50 mins, he covers garbage collection is the way for new languages to go -- program managability problems with Java's checked exception Java just has too many 'words' (too long code) -- maintainability classpath nightmare -- At the very least we need a equivalent of "which" (in Unix) Applets have failed Truly "Write Once, Run Anywhere" from other camps -- Microsoft XAML + Aurora vs Macromedia Flash + MXML + Flex Java on Desktop Eclipse 3.0 as a rich client platform Java is good on server developers: write once learning curve (Java is bad. too complex) users: seamlessly run anywhere (Java is bad, too complex) urlLink JDK 5.0 new features: generics, autoboxing, enumerations, attributes/metadata, new concurrency, syntax improvements (e.g. for-each) -- competition is good ... with a lot mentionings to Python urlLink Free Java report library and chart library Like it! thanks to bact!

We went to T in the Park on Sunday using honda car. It took 45 minutes to drive to the Balado Airfield and the 40 minutes to walk to the camp site. Gary set up the tent for us since yesterday.. we are so lucky ;) When we walk in to the concert arena, first thing i saw is The Red Bull stage for x-game. Wow!! red bull, you are so good at marketing. And I see 2 big outdoor stages and many concert tents and lot of people all over the area. And also see lots of shops and a big fun park which make me think about temple festival in Thailand.. I really miss that and feel want to go to see it again. Actually, every things that they provide in T in the Park is similar to temple festival. Except we can't set the camp in Thailand. We start with the main stage,Franz Ferdinand concert. We are quite close to the front of stage. I enjoy to see they dance. Take me out, mathinee, etc. Then we went to see lot of thing, fun park, drinking Tennent, eating pizza. I try to play the maching in fun park, just one. The result is I got headache after that.. ha ha ha .. stupid me ;p But I still enjoy staying there all day and all night:) We went to see the chemical brother and the last few songs of the snow patrol. Then play the bump car.. very fun but i got headache again! I really hate myself about this kind symptom:( In the cold windy night, we have just one sleeping bag which we though might be fine for wee people like us. But we ended up using one sleeping sheet to cover us and have to find some cloth to be underneath us.. MAN!! it's really cold!!! But hey, i'm ok.. it's a good experience for us ;) Next time, there will be 2 sleeping bag and a pillow for us .. and i won't play that things anymore .. ha ha We came back on Monday morning.. Get what .. while we were going home, the beat 106 DJ said that the ticket for next year will be available tomorrow!! and this year it was sold out in 10 weeks. Come on Man!, we don't even have any idea which band will be in the next year !! We arrive home sweet home and sleep very comfy in wee bed.. Oh bed! i miss u! xxx
My favorite web site for watching trailers when I'm bored and have nothing to do ;p Enjoy!!! xxx

Ho Ho Ho !!! today supervisor email to to look at the link. Guess what! it's an application about my project that i'm working on. have to read first to see how close it is to mine. feel really want to apply MDL to my project to make it different (if i have time) สู้สู้ ทาเคชิ !!

ดูข่าวบ่อยๆ ทีไร ลมมันขึ้นจริงๆ เรื่องบุกยิงผู้บริสุทธิ์ .. เรื่องไข้หวัดนก .. เรื่องอะไรต่อมิอะไรมากมาย โอ้ วันนี้มีข่าวใหม่ รัฐบาลไทย อยากซื้อทีม Heart หนังสือพิมพ์ Metro ลงข่าวด้วย แต่เมืองไทยยังไม่เห็นมีใครพูดถึงเลยแฮะ ส่งสัยจาเป็นทีมเล็กๆ ไม่ดังเหมือน Liverpool แต่จะซื้อทั้งที ไม่เอา Celtic เหรอคะ ท่านนาย ก แล้วทำให้ celtic เป็นแชมป์ยุโรปไปเลยนะคะ อิอิอิ

เหมือนเป็นคำแก้ตัว.. แต่ด้วยเป็นคนไม่ชอบอ่านหนังสือเลย(ให้ตายเหอะ โรบิน .. 555) แต่อยากรู้ข่าวสารบ้านเมืองทางเมืองไทย อดไม่ได้ที่จะต้องดูทีวีเมืองไทย จากที่ดูฟรีผ่าน urlLink www.doozija.com มาซักพัก ได้บ้างไม่ได้บ้าง เลยลงทุนจ่ายตังค์ดู จะว่าไปแล้วก็คุ้มเหมือนกันนะ แม้จะดูอยู่รายการเดียว แต่ก็ฮาดี เสียอย่างเดียวต้องลงไปดูลงคอมพิวเตอร์ เค้า block streamming protocol ทั้งหลายไว้น่ะ เศร้า :'( แต่ตอนนี้ก็สมใจละ 555 แต่อย่าลืมคอยเตือนตัวเองนะ ว่า .. project น่ะ ถึงไหนแล้ว รีบๆ เข้า เดือนหน้าจะได้สบาย :)

Congratuation to Ply, my friend in Edinburgh University :) We celebrate your day all day and night .. ha ha ha Start with having lunch at Rainbow Arch Then, star buck coffee Then, the Shrek II movie Then, dinnter at the mussle inn so so so enjoy :)

Today I went to see my supervisor. We discussed about the rankgene software because I counldn't make it work. We leaved it and then go to the GA phase. The meeting took about 1 hour which many interesting points. I went back to my house and try to figure out the problem (again) cause I don't want to leave it behind. Then suddenly, I can figure out with no reason .. It's just a format of the files. I should've notice that .. unix software needs unix file format Now, I can move on to the next phase with happy feeling ;D In conclusion, 1. transform original file into the defined format 2. normalized data 3. use rankgene software with data Next phase, 1. writing 2. GA , KNN Go Go Go !!!! Thank you man for the girl style Nike hat :) It looks CooL on Me .. ha ha ha xxx

just got fool by the fraud on ebay เจ็บใจ สุดๆ ฮื่มๆ แค้นมาก ถึงมากที่สุด จะต้องเอาเงินคืนมาให้ได้ คอยดูนะ !! โอ้ เดี๋ยวนี้ธนาคารที่ fraud department ด้วย เอาไว้จัดการกับเรื่องนี้โดยตรง พรุ่งนี้ต้องโทรไปเคลียร์ซะหน่อยแล้ว !!!
keep in mind... these are important than result !! xxx

If you get the unexpected result in your research, ... I didn't mean the result is very excellent.. But I mean it is not as good as what you expected.. What should you do? Will you change the technique with no time left to do that ? Will you just go on and report the 'not too bad' result ? so stress... jing jing... -_-" xxx

I haven't followed this two technologies for a while.. since i came to study here... They have been changing a lot!! PHP releases PHP 5.0 MySQL releases so many products: database server, MaxDB, Cluster, etc.. They also release the commercial version of their product. The weakness point of their technology in my point of view is there is no support team in every country. If they have a strong support team, they definitely can take the share market of the same kind of product from the Big company. for more information, please take a look at urlLink http://www.php.net , urlLink http://www.mysql.com
